effect.x_y: Raises user’s Defense by one stage. After this move is used, the power of ice ball and rollout are doubled until the user leaves the field.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Raises user’s Defense by one stage. After this move is used, the power of ice ball and rollout are doubled until the user leaves the field.

short_effect.x_y: Raises user’s Defense by one stage.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Raises user’s Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.x_y: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.
